main event: A UFO sighting reported over Arlington Heights, Illinois, on May 9, 1963, involving the observation of a small circular silver object.
interesting points: The object was first observed through a window and was brightly lit,It hovered for about 15 minutes before moving rapidly east,The object changed color from bright white to red before reverting back to white,It diminished in size as it moved away from the observers,The incident was reported to Project Blue Book for investigation.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Smith, civilian observers
